subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: After Brandt Snedeker lost his chance to win the Masters, he has gained a following of well-wishers with the same simple message: Dry your eyes and hold your head up.
snippet: After Brandt Snedeker lost his chance to win the Masters, he has gained a following of well-wishers with the same simple message: Dry your eyes and hold your head up.
